Description: Hieratic epistolary text recording a session of the local qnb.t-council at the town of Kom Medinat Gurab. The conflict concerned the inheritance of some slaves and the division of shares; their work, between the heirs.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381135) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381135)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: insect attack, bloom, frayed, loss Black ink Red ink Backed: white paper Tabbed: kraft paper Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Sandwich: board Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: fair (incomplete)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alan Henderson Gardiner
